title: Freshcode Vacancies
keywords: career, Freshcode vacancies, web developers, Java and Clojure engineers, JavaScript experts, senior web developer
description: You’re a web developer skilled in JavaScript, Clojure or Java and you look for a job in a fast-growing web company? Send us your CV and we’ll contact you.
page-text: We're looking for specialists in various fields and with different backgrounds and talents, who want to make a difference every day.

jobs.title: Front-end developer
skills: At least 1 year programming experience
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, React.js
Familiarity with Node.js
Experience in using REST API
Experience with Photoshop is a plus
Good verbal and written English skills
Knowledge of Git for code versioning handling will be a plus
Desire to improve your skills
To be familiar with Agile/Scrum methodology

jobs.title: Back-end developer
skills: Strong knowledge of Node.js
Experience with NoSQL, PostgreSQL databases
Familiarity with Docker, Vagrant
Knowledge of Agile methodologies
Familiarity with Continuous Integration (CI)
Good command of English (written ans verbal)
Knowledge of Git for code versioning handling
Desire to improve your skills

jobs.title: .NET, C# back-end developer
skills: At least 1 year of experience working on the web and multilayer applications
Solid experience in C# asp.net, MVC, Web API, WCF, Entity Framework, T-SQL
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JavaScript
Knowledge of Git for code versioning handling
Good verbal and written English skills
Experience in working in Agile environment

jobs.title: Android/iOS developer
skills: Strong programming skills in Objective-C, SWIFT, React Native
Experience in the development of hybrid mobile applications for the Android/iOS
Experience in JavaScript
Ability to learn things fast
Awareness of cross-platform compatibility issues
Good verbal and written English skills
